mapper.select: select role_id from ua_user_role as ur where ur.user_id = #{userId} and ur.del_flag = '1' union select dr.role_id from ua_dept_user as du, ua_dept_role as dr where dr.dept_id = du.dept_id and du.user_id = #{userId} and du.del_flag = '1' and dr.del_flag = '1'
select uur.*, ur.name from ua_user_role uur left join ua_role ur on uur.role_id = ur.id where uur.role_id = #{roleId} and uur.del_flag = '1' and ur.del_flag = '1'
